subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: The Public Sector Capacity Building Programme (PSCAP) is a five-year, USD 380 million, multi-donor support to Ethiopia's effort to improve governance and strengthen public sector capacity for improved service delivery at the federal, regional and local (woreda) levels. PSCAP main objectives are: (i) improving the scale, efficiency and responsiveness of public service delivery at the federal, regional and local levels, (ii) empowering citizens to participate more effectively in shaping their own development and (iii) promoting good governance and accountability
subproject.title: PSCAP
